name: Sync About Life
description:
Control the two cursors simultaneously with WASD and the arrow keys (or the left and right sticks on a controller) to collect the spheres and bring them back to your character.
Don't let the bars empty themselves and choose the life you will live by prioritizing knowledge, love or money.

This is the result of a 32h game jam and this game is brought to you by :

Design : François Alligier

Programming : Hubert Grossin

Graphism : Hervé Schneider, Fog Ryû, Pierre Celouté
